title: paramahamsa sArvabhauma
sahitya:
paramahamsa sArvabhauma pAdamulaku mangaLam pavitra caritra dEvuniki parama dayApAtruniki


anupallavi

  nigama sAra telipi mAku nidarshanamai jIvinci advaitamE satyamani akhilamella nirdharincE


caraNam 1    pAvanakarI kAvErI pArugrAmamuna janinci vEda shAstramella sadivi Idita madhyArjunalO
A dhrta guru shrI paramashivEndruDanu Ashrayinci AthyAtmike sADhanalO AritInu galavAniki
    caraNam 2    brahmamondE sarvamani brahmANDamu piNDamani tatvamunu agaparaci tArkikula madamaNaci
kOmaLamai kIrtanala kOshamuga vrAsi sadA brahmamulO iravAru brahmEndruni kAnatIlu
